data.title: Work in Canada
data.summary: Employer-specific, open permits, IEC, and LMIA-exempt pathways

blocks.Title: Work in Canada
blocks.Subtitle: Empowering Skilled Workers, Entrepreneurs & Professionals
blocks.description:
At TENTACULAR IMMIGRATION SOLUTIONS LTD, we provide regulated, strategic guidance for skilled workers, entrepreneurs, investors, and self-employed individuals seeking to contribute meaningfully to the Canadian economy. Whether you're pursuing a temporary work permit or aiming for permanent residency, we help you navigate federal and provincial immigration pathways with clarity and compliance.

Let us support your transition — from global talent to Canadian resident — with legal insight, personalized planning, and care at every step.

blocks.Heading: Work Permit Types
blocks.description: Choose the right work permit pathway based on your situation and career goals

Cards.title: Employer-Specific Work Permits
Cards.description: Tied to a specific employer, job, and location.

lists.listItem: Valid LMIA or employer offer number
Formal employment offer from a Canadian employer
Compliance with employer, job role, and location

Cards.title: Open Work Permits
Cards.description: Work for almost any employer in Canada without needing an LMIA.

blocks.Heading: Who Can Apply for Open Work Permits?
blocks.description: Open work permits provide flexibility to work for almost any employer in Canada

Cards.title: Post-Graduation Work Permit (PGWP)
Cards.description: Graduates applying for a Post-Graduation Work Permit

Cards.title: PR Applicants from Inside Canada
Cards.description: Family sponsorship or Express Entry applicants

Cards.title: Vulnerable Workers
Cards.description: Workers under employer-specific permits experiencing abuse

blocks.Heading: International Experience Canada (IEC)
blocks.description: Work, travel, and gain valuable experience in Canada

Cards.title: Working Holiday
Cards.description: Open work permit — flexible jobs to fund your travel

Cards.title: Young Professionals
Cards.description: Employer-specific work permit for career-related experience

blocks.Heading: Other Work Permit Options
blocks.description: Specialized work permit pathways for different professional situations

Cards.title: Global Skills Strategy (GSS)
Cards.description: Fast-track permits for high-skilled workers. Processing ≈ 2 weeks.

Cards.title: Intra-Company Transfer (ICT)
Cards.description: Transfer executives or managers within multinationals.

Cards.title: C11 Entrepreneur Work Permit
Cards.description: For entrepreneurs and investors — build your business in Canada.

Cards.title: C10 Significant Benefit Work Permit
Cards.description: For innovators and professionals contributing to Canada’s interests.

blocks.title: How to Apply for Employer-Specific Work Permits

items.listItem: Obtain LMIA or employer offer number
Submit your application online or in Canada

blocks.title: How to Apply for Open Work Permits

items.listItem: Prepare eligibility documents (PGWP, spouse status, PR)
Apply online through the IRCC portal
Get tailored assistance for compliance and success

blocks.Heading: Compare Your Path
blocks.description: Quick comparison of work permit options to help you choose the right pathway.

blocks.Heading: Ready to Start Working in Canada?
blocks.description: Whether you need an employer-specific permit, open permit, or specialized pathway, we're here to guide you through the process with expert knowledge.
